optimalPlay:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
optimalPlay:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

optimalPlay:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
optimalPlay:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
optimalPlay:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

optimalPlay:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
optimalPlay:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

optimalPlay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
optimalPlay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !optimalPlay:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

optimalPlay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
optimalPlay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !optimalPlay:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
